name: biomni-get-rna-seq-archs4
title: Biomni: Get RNA-seq from ARCHS4
description: Fetch RNA-seq expression data for a gene from the ARCHS4 database
content:
Overview

Retrieves RNA-seq expression data for a specific gene from the ARCHS4 database, returning the top K tissues with highest expression levels (median TPM values).

Input

Provide a gene name (e.g., 'TP53', 'BRCA1')

Output

Returns median transcripts-per-million (TPM) values per tissue, ranked by expression level
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/genomics/get_rna_seq_archs4.py "${geneName}" --top-k ${topK} -o "${outputDir}"

spec.name: geneName
spec.label: Gene Name
spec.description: Gene name to query (e.g., TP53, BRCA1)

spec.name: topK
spec.label: Top K Tissues
spec.description: Number of top tissues to return
